## GetProductOptions.includePrices property

Set to `true` to retrieve the prices along with a product. If not set, the product is returned with no prices (i.e. [Product.prices](./firestore-stripe-payments.product.prices.md) field will be empty).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
includePrices?: boolean;
```
